column5: So I made a video.  Beautiful day in the sun, in the boat, on the water but I'm done with pan fish. Surface temps were as high as 13 Celsius. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FPyZJBsvOKE&feature=youtu.be  Besides some initial instructions I've been trying to let him do it on his own. I didn't even say anything about the jazz hands finish. Last night when I uploaded the video to the computer though Ryan saw it and said "What am I doing with my hand?" So some refinement might be coming.  Driving the boat:   Had a musky and a pike follow a 2 inch minnow bait in one back bay. Ryan had a "big" bass on his tiny tube jig until it wrapped in the wood. Some catfish, turtles, otter and a pair of mink.
hahahaha....love that technique! Very flamboyant. Kinda says "Ta Da!"
Tah dah! Awesome and thanks for sharing! HH
They do learn from watching. Just saying.LOL  That was cool Rob.  The weekend offered up some great weather. Simcoe was like glass all morning.
Ya except for the thing with the left hand it is a little startling how much he looks like me.  I'd really like to talk to whom ever put mother's day during spring fishin'.
